name: Astrofall
description:
[[ //TEXT TRANSMISSION// ]]

ASTROFALL

Can You Survive the Astrofall?
ONLY ONE WILL MAKE IT...

Astrofall is a online multiplayer survival platformer, where players compete to make it to the rescue shuttle first to win.
Created to be a fast and fun multiplayer experience, Astrofall is perfect to load up for a quick session to test your reflexes against friends and foes.
Inspired by the likes of “Mirrors Edge” and "Fall Guys" Astrofall looks to fill a gap in-between casual competitive fun set in real world settings. Providing yet another light-hearted thrill to the finish line.

The perfect way to competivly settle a score, in-game.
